title: Mama June and boyfriend Geno Doak both plead 'not guilty' to crack cocaine possession
text:
Mama June Shannon and her boyfriend Geno Doak pleaded not guilty to crack cocaine possession on Tuesday.

The pair were not present for the arraignment at the Macon County Courthouse, but used their lawyer to enter into not guilty pleas, according to TMZ.

June, 40, and her 44-year-old beau are both facing charges of felony drug possession stemming from a March arrest in Alabama.

Tough: Mama June Shannon and her boyfriend Geno Doak pleaded not guilty to crack cocaine possession on Tuesday; seen on From Not to Hot

The gossip site reported that WeTV camera crews were on-site for the hearing to 'catch June and film her' but to no avail.

Just last month, Geno and June stormed into the courthouse while yelling at photographers to get out of the way.

At the time, their hearing was postponed, but that didn't stop Geno from declaring 'not guilty' as he made his way through the parking lot.

June hid underneath a black hooded sweatshirt and sunglasses, and even refused to speak to her sister Joanne.

TMZ reported in September that the reality star's sister is leading the family's intervention to get her away from her boyfriend.

In May, Joanne, along with WeTV, confronted her along with her younger daughter Alana aka 'Honey Boo Boo' with Dr. Ish Major, but it didn't work.

Alana, 14, broke down and cried during the attempted intervention, adding that she wants to move back home.

Honey Boo Boo has been living with her 19-year-old sister Pumpkin throughout the turmoil and it was reported that June and Geno were living in an Alabama casino.

The We TV network has been the home of Shannon's makeover show From Not to Hot since 2017 and producers have scrambled to get her the help she needs following her crack cocaine arrest in March.

Shannon received the spin-off from her daughter's TLC reality series, Here Comes Honey Boo Boo, which was a spin-off from the famed pageant show Toddlers and Tiaras.
